name: Tetris (itch) (OLDbespreDEL)
description:
Game control:

Game control:

Left - A or left arrow  
Right -D or right arrow
Down - S or down arrow
Rotate - W or up arrow 
Pause - space
Exit - Esc

Single mode:

It is a classic Tetris, the purpose of which is to arrange the shapes so that all the cells of the same row were filled.

One company:

This Tetris on the passage, contains an infinite number of levels.The goal of each level is to get to the cell filled with black color and erase it along with the line.

Play together:

- Cooperative. You can play with a friend in turn on one keyboard, the control button of the second player-the arrow keys on the keyboard.
- Against each other. Each player fills his glass with numbers, the first who reaches the limit of the glass, he loses. Control of the second player is also carried out on the arrows.

Play together for survival:

You play against each other on different glasses, for each burning of 2, 3 or 4 lines the rival receives 2, 4 or 6 lines of garbage cells in glass. The current player who fills the glass loses.
